caption:
“Train the spirit as you train the sword.”

Reflection:
The warrior of faith sharpens the heart daily — discipline, prayer, endurance. The unseen battle is the fiercest of all.

Commentary:
This quote calls us to spiritual conditioning: to practice virtue as diligently as skill. Mastery of the self precedes mastery of the fight.
